code: import cartActionTypes from'./cartActionTypes';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:cartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItemFromCart=function removeItemFromCart(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};
